stateCompliance.headline: Understanding Cash Advance Laws in Tallahassee, Florida
stateCompliance.content: Residents of Tallahassee are protected by Florida's comprehensive payday lending regulations, administered by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation's Division of Consumer Finance. As the state capital, Tallahassee residents benefit from some of the most thoroughly enforced consumer protections in the nation for payday loans.
keyPoints: All payday lenders in Tallahassee must be licensed by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation
You can only have one payday loan at a time in Florida, enforced by statewide database
Single-payment loans are capped at $500 with maximum 10% fee plus $5 verification fee
Installment loans are capped at $1,000 with maximum 8% biweekly fee on outstanding balance
You must wait 24 hours after paying off one loan before taking out another
Loan rollovers and extensions are prohibited by law
If you can't pay on time, you're entitled to a 60-day grace period with free credit counseling
You cannot be criminally prosecuted for an unpaid payday loan
Prepayment penalties are prohibited - you can pay off early without extra cost
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is provided for general educational purposes only and should not be construed as legal or financial advice. Payday loan laws and regulations are subject to change. For the most accurate and up-to-date information about Florida payday loan regulations, please contact the Florida Office of Financial Regulation at (850) 487-9687 or visit flofr.gov. Consult with a licensed financial advisor or attorney regarding your specific situation before making borrowing decisions.

nearbyLocations.headline: Also Serving Nearby Leon County Communities
nearbyLocations.intro: Can't make it to our Tallahassee location? We also serve these nearby communities:

faq.question: Where is your Tallahassee cash advance location?
faq.answer: Our Tallahassee branch is located at 1623 Capital Circle Southwest, Suite 140, right near beautiful Lake Jackson and the Florida Capitol. We're easily accessible from I-10 Exit 199.

faq.question: What are your hours at the Tallahassee location?
faq.answer: We're open Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, and Saturday 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM. We're closed on Sundays. Walk-ins always welcome!

faq.question: Is the Tallahassee location easy to find?
faq.answer: Yes! We're right on Capital Circle Southwest, very easy to find. The location is convenient from downtown, I-10, and all major roads.

faq.question: What's the fastest way to get cash in Tallahassee?
faq.answer: Most customers get approved within 15-30 minutes and walk out with cash the same day. You can also apply online before visiting our location to speed up the process even more.

faq.question: Can I borrow money for business purposes?
faq.answer: Cash advance loans are intended for personal emergency expenses. If you need business financing, you may want to explore other loan options or speak with your bank.
